# remove(action:)

**Instance Method**

Remove an identified action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func remove(action removedIdentifier: UIAction.Identifier)
```

## Parameters

- **removedIdentifier**: The identifier of the action to remove.
title: remove(action:)
